_comment: Copy this file to test_config.json and adjust paths for your machine. test_config.json is gitignored.
_instructions: Paths can be absolute or relative to the repo root.
Set 'data_dir' if all three test files live in the same directory.
Set individual entries under 'files' to override per-file paths (e.g. when files are in subdirectories).

files.electrical_blank: Data Parse Agent/Data Context/Data Set 1/Electrical PN_MFG Search_NOT COMPLETE.XLSX
files.electrical_complete: Data Parse Agent/Data Context/Data Set 1/Electrical PN_MFG Search_COMPLETE.xlsx
